attributes.action: Refugee status for All South Africans in need of Refuge.
attributes.additional_details: South Africans are currently being murdered. Employment is falling to an all time low. People are fearing for their lives as riots are esculating. There is a concerning future for the youth of South Africa.
attributes.background: Would just like to create an opportunity for South Africans toe seek asylum in the UK

rejection.details:
People can already claim asylum if they have left their country and are unable to go back because they fear persecution.

You can find out more:

https://www.gov.uk/claim-asylum
